title: Victoria Memorial
description: Step into a world of grandeur and history at the Victoria Memorial in Kolkata. This majestic white marble monument is a portal to the city's colonial past, surrounded by serene gardens. Immerse yourself in the rich heritage of Kolkata through its extensive collection of art and historical exhibits. Your journey through time begins here at the Victoria Memorial

packages.title: Two-Day Kolkata City Tour
packages.text: Experience the best of Kolkata in just two unforgettable days. Let us take you on a whirlwind journey through this vibrant city, ensuring you don't miss a single moment of its charm.

packages.title: One-Day Kolkata City Tour
packages.text: Discover the heart of Kolkata in one day with our all-inclusive city tour. We've condensed the city's essence into a whirlwind adventure, taking you to its most iconic landmarks and introducing you to its rich culture and flavor.

packages.title: Explore the Victoria Memorial
packages.text: This immersive tour takes you through the splendid Victoria Memorial, a symbol of the city's colonial past. Discover its captivating history and art collection, surrounded by well-manicured gardens.

packages.title: Visit the Howrah Bridge
packages.text: Explore the architectural marvel that is the Howrah Bridge, an emblem of the city's bustling charm. A journey through history and culture, this tour showcases the bridge's grandeur and its significance in Kolkata's vibrant tapestry

packages.title: Street Food Tour
packages.text: Savor the flavors of Kolkata as you traverse the bustling streets, sampling local delicacies like phuchka, kathi rolls, and more. Join us to discover the city's culinary soul, one delicious bite at a time

packages.title: Art and History of Kolkata
packages.text: Explore the city's rich heritage through visits to renowned landmarks like the Indian Museum, Marble Palace, and South Park Street Cemetery. Let us guide you through the chapters of Kolkata's fascinating story.
